EmailTemplate.name: ASI TnE Rejected Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Travel & Entertainment Claim form {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.OwnerFullName},
Your Travel & Entertainment Claim form {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} has been rejected.
Please click this link {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} to view the Travel & Entertainment form details.
